ClassDef.summary: The containing window for a collection of forms displayed in a tabbed manner.

remarks.para: There are two types of in appearance: and , determined by the docking state of the .
You can derive your own class from to make your own customizations. If so, you need to override the property to return the instance of your own class.

overloads.summary: Initializes a new instance of DockPane class.

Constructor.name: (DockContent, DockState, bool)
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of DockPane class, with specified visible docking state.
Constructor.param: The first DockContent for this DockPane.
The visible docking state for this DockPane.
True to show the , otherwise, false.

Constructor.name: (DockContent, FloatWindow, bool)
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of DockPane class, as nested docking to specified FloatWindow.
Constructor.param: The first DockContent for this DockPane.
True to show the , otherwise, false.

Constructor.name: (DockContent, DockPane, DockAlignment, double, bool)
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of DockPane class, as specified nested docking.
Constructor.param: The edge of the target to dock.
The proportion size of the source to take inside the target .

Constructor.name: (DockContent, Rectangle, bool)
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of DockPane class, as floating at the specified bounds.
Constructor.param: The bounds of the floating window.

Property.name: ActiveContent
Property.summary: Gets or sets the currently active form.

Property.name: AllowRedocking
Property.summary: Gets or sets to specify whether drag and drop re-docking is allowed.
Property.value: True if drag and drop re-docking is allowed, otherwise, false.

Property.name: CaptionText
Property.summary: Gets the text displayed for the caption.
Property.value: The text displayed for the caption.
Property.remarks: The default implementation returns the property of current active form. You can override this property to provide your own implementation.

Property.name: Contents
Property.summary: Gets the collection of contained forms.
Property.value: The which contains all the forms for this .

remarks.para:
A object can be added to the by various of ways:
Calling one of class's constructors, providing the object as parameter.
Explicitly setting one of the , or properties of class.
Implicitly setting the docking state of the , for example, calling one of the methods.
You can access the contained collection of forms through the property of class , and you can access a 's containing through its , or properties.
If there is no in this , this will be disposed automatically.

Property.name: DisplayingContents
Property.summary: Gets the collection of displaying forms.
Property.value: The which contains all the displaying forms for this .

Property.name: DockState
Property.summary: Gets the docking state of this .

Property.name: DockWindow
Property.summary: Gets or sets the contains this .
Property.value: Gets or sets the contains this .

Property.name: FloatWindow
Property.summary: Gets or sets the contains this .
Property.value: Gets or sets the contains this .

Property.name: IsActivated
Property.value: True if this is activated, otherwise, false.

Property.name: IsActiveDocumentPane
Property.summary: Gets whether this is active document pane.
Property.value: True if this is active document pan, otherwise, false.

Property.name: IsAutoHide
Property.summary: Gets whether the docking state is auto hide.
Property.value: True if the docking state is auto hide, otherwise, false.

Property.name: IsFloat
Property.value: True if this is floating, otherwise, false.
Property.remarks: The property is fixed during the construction class, based on the initial docking state. If this property returns true, it can only be contained by a as its ; otherwise it can only be contained by a as its .

Property.name: IsHidden
Property.summary: Gets whether all the contained forms are invisible in this .
Property.value: True if all the contained forms are invisible in this .

Property.name: NestedDockingStatus
Property.summary: Gets the nested docking status for this .
Property.value: A object to represent the nested docking status for this .

Method.name: Activate()
Method.summary: Activates the DockPane and gives it focus.

overloads.summary: Nested docks this to the specified .

Method.name: AddToDockList(IDockListContainer)
Method.summary: Nested docks this to the specified , with default settings.
Method.returns: If the property conforms to the container's docking state, the current object will be returned; otherwise, a new instance of object will be created and returned.

Method.name: AddToDockList(IDockListContainer, DockPane, DockAlignment, double)
Method.summary: Nested docks this to the specified , with specified settings.

Method.name: Float()
Method.summary: Shows all contained forms as floating.
Method.returns: The new floating for the forms.

Method.name: IsDockStateValid(DockState)
Method.summary: Tests if the giving docking state conforms to the property of all the contained forms.
Method.returns: True if the giving docking state conforms to the property of all the contained forms; otherwise, false.

Method.name: OnDockStateChanged(EventArgs)
Method.param: An that contains the event data.

Method.name: OnIsActivatedChanged(EventArgs)
Method.param: An that contains the event data.

Method.name: OnIsActiveDocumentPaneChanged(EventArgs)
Method.param: An that contains the event data.

Method.name: RestoreToPanel()
Method.summary: Shows all contained forms as non-floating.

Method.name: SetContentIndex(DockContent, int)
Method.summary: Moves the specified form to the specified position in the tab strip.
Method.param: The zero-based index represents the new position in the tab strip.

Method.name: SetDockState(DockState)
Method.summary: Shows all contained forms as specified docking state.
Method.param: The specified docking state to display.
Method.returns: The for the new docking state.

Method.name: SetNestedDockingProportion(double)
Method.summary: Sets the proportion size of this DockPane for nested docking.
Method.param: The proportion size to set. Value must between 0 and 1.
